H0.text: who wrote put your hand in the hand of the man who stilled the water. Bob Dylan

H1.text: who wrote put your hand in the hand of the man who stilled the water. John Lennon

H2.text: who wrote put your hand in the hand of the man who stilled the water. Kris Kristofferson

H3.text: who wrote put your hand in the hand of the man who stilled the water. Gene MacLellan

A4.text: Gene MacLellan composed 'Put Your Hand in the Hand'.

A5.text: Over 100 performers, including Elvis Presley, Joan Baez, and Bing Crosby have recorded 'Put Your Hand in the Hand'.
